To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private KaufmanEfficiencyRatio _ker;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_ker = KER(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_ker.IsReady)
{
    var current = _ker.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.ker = self.KER(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.ker.IsReady:
    current = self.ker.Current.Value
